Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Western. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Western.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Harlem/Lake
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Harlem due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are standing at Harlem due to signal problems.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
